subject: Re: [junit] How to test void methods using JUnit
msgSnippet: ... You can find an answer by searching either the web or the archives of this group. You could also read _JUnit Recipes_, chapter 2. -- J. B. (Joe)
messageBody:
speaktomk wrote:
> Hi,
>
> I'm having a java application, i want to test all the methods available
> in this application.
> I can able to test the method having the return type like
> boolean,String,int,Vector,Hashtable.
>
> But i don't know how to test the void methods in this application.
>
> Please give the suggestions to test the void methods using JUnit.

You can find an answer by searching either the web or the archives of
this group. You could also read _JUnit Recipes_, chapter 2.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
2005 Gordon Pask Award Winner for contribution to Agile practice
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
